caption: Citi paid out 53% of the target amount to employees eligible for the programme in 2024, its third and final year
trend_summary: According to the caption and article text, Citigroup paid out 53% of its target transformation bonus in 2024. This represents a declining trend from the 94% paid out in 2022 and 80% in 2023.
author: Joshua Franklin
article_title: Citi cuts top bankers' bonuses tied to turnaround drive
